titleStmt.title: To the right honourable the Lords assembled in Parliament the humble petition of Phillip Earle of Chesterfield, delivered and read in the Lords House upon Saturday the thirteenth of February, 1646.
titleStmt.author: Chesterfield, Philip Stanhope, Earl of, 1584-1656.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
